backend/main.mo: Defines job posts, schemes, user profiles, and admin‑protected CRUD logic with access control checks and data storage maps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind‑based style variables and theme definitions for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for public pages and admin pages using AdminRouteGuard and shared RootLayout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSetti: A dialog for viewing and saving a Gemini API key using localStorage.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Ima: Editor for an image/banner block, allowing URL, alt text editing, and image preview.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Lin: Editor for a link button block where label and URL can be modified.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Par: Simple editor for paragraph text within a job post block.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Tab: Editable table block allowing row/column management and cell editing with a title field.
frontend/src/components/admin/blocks/Tit: Editor for heading blocks letting users set heading level and text.
frontend/src/components/admin/DeleteJobP: Confirmation dialog for deleting a job post with a loading state.
frontend/src/components/admin/JobPostBlo: Editor for adding, reordering, updating, and deleting structured content blocks in a job post.
frontend/src/components/admin/JobPostFor: Form for creating or editing job posts, handling metadata, images, fees, vacancies, links, and content blocks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ManageDail: Panel for creating and publishing a daily quiz with validation and status display.
frontend/src/components/admin/PhotoUploa: Floating tool for uploading an image, previewing it, and copying its data URL or HTML snippet.
frontend/src/components/AiChatModal.tsx: Implements an AI chat modal with message history, Gemini API requests, auto‑scrolling, and API‑key‑based access.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays login-required or access-denied messages with optional login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminPasswo: Modal prompting for the admin password and unlocking admin access on success.
Wrapper that auto-opens the admin password modal on load.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard enforcing authentication, admin role, and local admin unlock before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and clearing admin session data.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and shows a resettable fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/FloatingSocialBu: Floating social buttons for WhatsApp, Telegram, and an AI chat modal toggle.
frontend/src/components/home/DailyQuizSe: Renders a daily quiz with selectable options, correctness feedback, and explanation.
frontend/src/components/home/Preparation: Shows preparation resources including books, courses, and test series using fetched data.
frontend/src/components/home/QuickOffici: Displays a list of official external links with optional highlighting.
frontend/src/components/home/SarkariSche: Renders a tabbed section listing Rajasthan and India government schemes, fetching data and displaying loading, error, and apply actions. Includes a SchemesList component for rendering filtered scheme cards.
frontend/src/components/home/SimpleJobsS: Displays a list of simple job updates with search filtering and links to notifications. Shows a message when no jobs match.
frontend/src/components/home/StudyCorner: Shows categorized study materials using an accordion, linking to PDFs or external resources. Handles empty categories and items.
frontend/src/components/home/VerticalTic: Implements a vertical scrolling ticker with pause-on-hover and reduced-motion support. Duplicates content for seamless looping.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/Impor: Renders apply, notification, and website action buttons with availability checks from job post data.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/JobDe: Displays job details sections including important dates, fees, age limits, and other tables derived from a JobPost.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/JobPo: Renders dynamic job post content blocks such as titles, paragraphs, images, links, and tables.
Shows a job poster image with error fallback to a gradient banner containing the job name.
frontend/src/components/JobDetails/Usefu: Builds a table listing admit card, syllabus, notification, and website links with status indicators.
frontend/src/components/MotivationalBann: Simple banner displaying a motivational Hindi phrase.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Main site layout with header, navigation, search, theme toggle, login, and floating social UI integration.
frontend/src/components/SiteNoticeTicker: Displays a scrolling marquee notice with an animated bell icon.
frontend/src/contexts/JobSearchContext.t: Provides a context for storing and updating the job search query. Ensures consumers use the provider.
frontend/src/features/dailyQuiz/dailyQui: Manages storage of a daily quiz object in localStorage, including fetching, publishing with timestamp, and clearing.
frontend/src/features/homeCards/homeCard: Stores home card items in localStorage with default seed data and supports CRUD operations. Allows updating and deleting individual cards.
frontend/src/features/officialLinks/offi: Maintains official links with defaults, providing CRUD and drag reorder operations via localStorage. Supports highlight flags and ID generation.
frontend/src/features/preparationResourc: Manages book and test series resources in localStorage with default items and full CRUD operations. Separately handles books and test series arrays.
frontend/src/features/simpleJobs/simpleJ: Stores simple job entries in localStorage, supporting adding new jobs with generated IDs and deleting existing ones.
frontend/src/features/studyCorner/studyC: Manages study categories and items with CRUD operations persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmitCardPosts.ts: Fetches admit card job posts using the backend actor with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientAdminAuth.ts: Handles client-side admin unlock via password, storing state in localStorage and session parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useDailyQuiz.ts: Subscribes to and exposes the daily quiz stored in localStorage with a publish method.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomeCards.ts: Provides localStorage-backed CRUD operations for home card items via sync external store.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity restoration through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Queries backend to verify admin status based on current identity and client admin unlock state.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPost.ts: Fetches a single job post by ID using the backend actor with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPostMutations.t: Provides add, update, and delete mutations for job posts and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useJobPosts.ts: Fetches job posts filtered by category using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfficialLinks.ts: Manages official links with localStorage-backed CRUD and reorder operations.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreparationResourc: Manages preparation resources (books and test series) with localStorage-backed CRUD ops.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchemeMutations.ts: Provides add, update, and delete scheme mutations with query invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchemes.ts: Fetches all schemes from the backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSimpleJobs.ts: Provides a hook to read, add, and remove simple jobs using a localStorage-backed external store.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyCorner.ts: Exposes study categories and items with CRUD helpers synced via localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useSyllabusRepository: Fetches syllabus repository job posts via a backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemePreference.ts: Manages light/dark theme preference with localStorage persistence and DOM class updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode tokens, and custom KBC quiz styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Provides an admin dashboard for managing official links, study corner items, schemes, settings, and daily quiz tools.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditJobPos: Admin page for creating or editing job posts using a form, with save logic and navigation after submission.
Admin interface to view, create, edit, and delete job posts with category labels and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/AdmitCardHallPage.tsx: Displays and filters admit card posts with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckYourAgePage.tsx: Implements an age calculator UI that computes years, months, and days between two dates.
frontend/src/pages/ClientAdminPage.tsx: Provides an admin login and panel to manage jobs, links, home cards, books, tests, and API keys.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders homepage sections combining backend job posts and fallback items with search filtering.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed job post page with loading/error states, hero section, content blocks, details tables, and navigation back home.
frontend/src/pages/SyllabusRepositoryPag: Lists syllabus documents with search filtering, loading/error handling, link status checks, and navigation to related job posts.
frontend/src/utils/linkAvailability.ts: Utility that returns availability status and label for a given link based on whether a URL is present.
frontend/src/utils/localStorageStore.ts: Implements a scoped localStorage manager with key-based subscriptions, caching, and stable snapshot retrieval.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, extended theme values, custom colors, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project's admin authentication feature state, required behavior, known issues, and pending feature requests.
